name: Roomba Quest 2
description:
So a couple of years ago I fell down the stairs and injured both of my feet. I was house-bound for a while (and quite grumpy) so I made a game called Roomba Quest.

I write this in the year 2020.

Anyway, here's a sequel.

Bitsy doesn't save so set aside half an hour to play. You can play this page on your phone.

This game was made with Bitsy and Borksy.
